content: Bay area folks, I've been in Fremont for a few months now. Would love to join any local meetings if they're still happening.
@Paul Wintz do you know @Kyle Miller already?
Note that we have almost no applied math in mathlib so if you're interest in control theory indicates some applied math training then you'll find plenty of opportunities to contribute.
A couple of us in the Berkeley math department are meeting on Mondays during tea time (3pm-4pm).
After a year in Orsay, France with @Patrick Massot and @Floris van Doorn, I'm back near San Francisco (and in Santa Cruz in particular).
